description: Source code for the mobile application's home screen, including UI layout, navigation logic, and interaction handling using Flutter framework.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget representing the application's home screen with app bar, banners, genre grid, and new arrivals carousel.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the internal UI state and navigation actions for HomeScreen.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up the search controller when the widget is disposed.

methods.name: _openListing
methods.description: Navigates to the listing page, optionally filtered by category slug.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for a given book.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the home screen, including app bar, banners, genre grid, and carousel.

methods.name: _genresGrid
methods.description: Constructs the grid of genre tiles.

methods.name: _circleIcon
methods.description: Creates a circular icon widget with tap handling.
